title: The dos and don’ts of using ChatGPT in your daily life
description: Chatbots can be amazingly helpful — but only if you learn how to use them well. Here’s our advice.

title: Truth Social investment partner extends deadline, avoiding liquidation
description: The extension was granted three days before Digital World would have been required to dissolve itself and return money to investors.

title: Long sidelined, youth activists demand a say in online safety debate
description: Youth advocates are a powerful new lobbying force in the debate over children’s online safety in the U.S.

title: Elon Musk wants you to know he doesn’t have a nice house
description: Reports that Tesla is building a glass house in Austin for Elon Musk have renewed speculation about the billionaire’s itinerant lifestyle.
